name: Phantom Girl Rhythm
description:
Phantom Girl Rhythm is rhythmic fencing game made for the Touhou Pride Game Jam 3 over the course of 15 days..

After an argument about Youmu's training habits, Reisen has challenged her girlfriend to a duel. Help Youmu train and overcome her differences with Reisen through rhythmic fencing action!

Controls

  • "D" Red notes
  • "F" Purple notes
  • "J" Green notes
  • "K" Blue notes
  • "Left Shift" to Block

Credits

  • Joshlynn - Programmer, Game designer.
  • PixiTales - Programming, Visual Novel
  • PraetoPotato - VN sprites, Backgrounds
  • Jhzargo - Animations, UI
  • Yal - Music, Saving the entire game last minute
  • Big Gay Dinosaur - Music
  • VItheSixth - Story, Dialogue
